means: 彼勒（弥尔顿的<失乐园>中的堕落天使之一）

sentence.Network_en: Of whom BELIAL, ASMODAY, and GAAP, were Chief .
sentence.Network_cn: BELIAL, ASMODAY 和GAAP是其中的领袖.

sentence.Network_en: A scoffer, a debauched person, and, in brief, a man of Belial.
sentence.Network_cn: 一个玩世不恭的人, 一个生活放荡的家伙, 总而言之, 是个恶棍.

sentence.Network_en: A scoffer , debauched person , and , in brief, a man of Belial.
sentence.Network_cn: 玩世不恭者, 是只知一切事物的价钱而不知其价值的人.

PerfectNetExp.abs: beli 贝利, belial 不肖之徒, beliaeff 贝利亚耶夫

auth_sentence.content: The brood of Belial, the draffe of men.
